name: Plan N - Organic Time-Restricted Feeding Muscle Gainer

Meal 1.details: Organic Protein-Packed Brunch: 3 organic eggs (scrambled), 4 oz organic smoked salmon, 1/2 organic avocado, 1 slice organic whole grain toast, 1 cup organic mixed berries, 1 tbsp organic olive oil
Meal 1.instructions: Scramble eggs in olive oil. Serve with smoked salmon, avocado, toast, and berries.

Snack.details: Organic Protein Smoothie: 2 scoops organic whey protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 organic banana, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1/4 cup organic rolled oats

Meal 2.details: Organic Chicken Quinoa Bowl: 6 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, zucchini), 2 tbsp organic hummus, 1 tbsp organic olive oil
Meal 2.instructions: Grill chicken. Roast vegetables. Serve over quinoa with a dollop of hummus and drizzle of olive oil.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Energy Balls: 1/2 cup organic dates, 1/4 cup organic almonds, 1/4 cup organic pumpkin seeds, 2 tbsp organic chia seeds, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Process ingredients in a food processor, roll into balls.

Post-Workout Meal.details: Organic Steak with Sweet Potato and Greens: 8 oz organic grass-fed steak, 1 large organic sweet potato, 2 cups organic mixed greens, 2 tbsp organic balsamic vinaigrette
Post-Workout Meal.instructions: Grill steak. Bake sweet potato. Toss greens with vinaigrette. Serve together.
